|pop_est_footnotes = |population_est = |area_total_km2 = 8.13 |area_land_km2 = 7.84 |area_water_km2 = 0.29 |population_density_km2 = 3.06 }} Lake Buena Vista is a city in Orange County, Florida, United States. It is mostly known for being home to the Walt Disney World Resort. It is one of two Florida municipalities controlled by The Walt Disney Company. The other city is Bay Lake. Lake Buena Vista is part of the Orlandoâ€“Kissimmee Metropolitan Statistical Area. ==Points of interest== * Walt Disney World ** Typhoon Lagoon ** Disney Springs ** Lake Buena Vista Golf Course ==Education== Lake Buena Vista is within Orange County Public Schools."2010 CENSUS - CENSUS BLOCK MAP: Lake Buena Vista city, FL."
